item.val: Okinawa Half Day Snorkeling and Introductory Diving to CHIBISI
Okinawa Half Day Snorkeling and Introductory Diving to CHIBISI provide English, Mandarin and Cantonese speaking marine staff
fotoShisa : Underwater and Watersport Professional Photographer Services

Marine activities and Diving around Okinawa is an amazing unforgettable experience, you will encounter some beautiful underwater creatures and have a ton of fun on the water. So why not have a professional photographer along to capture all the great moments for you to treasure forever!

Marine House SEASIR Naha

  • Full day trip to Kerama
  • Half day trip to Chibisi

Marine Club Berry

  • Water Sports
Over 20 people each person additional charge JPY3,000
Maximum 6 - 8 hours depend on arrival ferry time to Aka island

Book it with SEASIR / BERRY activities, just note the “fotoShisa REQUIRED” in the comments box on the booking form. Our booking office will check the availability with fotoShisa and reply you by email.
